item.description:
Last week America watched as four presidential candidates debated.......wait a minute....you mean Obama and Romney aren't the only ones running (no thanks to the mainstream media) ??? Yep, that is right!! Lets send a message LOUD and CLEAR that as voters we have many presidential candidates to choose from.

Please join us for Round 2 of the fair, equal and honest third party debate between libertarian candidate Gary Johnson and Green candidate Jill Stein.

Yay, it's official!! The Cheers at Faneuil Hal...l will have the honor of hosting our debate party. We will have the downstairs section with a full cash bar and the regular food menu available. Just ask for the debate party at the door and they will direct you. I really hope Sam Malone is working that night!

Come watch, drink and socialize with fellow liberty lovers as we rock the establishment by refusing to accept the two party system!!
item.name: Join us for our "We Refuse To Accept The 2 Party System" Debate Party!!!
